aka: 难以置信号残骸中的珍宝
难以置信的沉船之宝藏(台)
this_title: Treasures from the Wreck of the Unbelievable
trans_title: 难以置信号残骸中的珍宝
难以置信的沉船之宝藏(台)
introduction: ‘Treasures from the Wreck of the Unbelievable’ charts the story behind Damien Hirst’s most ambitious project to date. Almost ten years in the making, the eponymous exhibition was displayed across the Punta della Dogana and Palazzo Grassi in Venice from 9th April – 3rd December 2017. Hirst collaborated with director Sam Hobkinson and producer Nicolas Kent to chronicle the exhibition’s extraordinary backstory; the discovery and excavation of an ancient shipwreck.
foreign_title: Treasures from the Wreck of the Unbelievable
